title: Fibre Channel Registered State Change Notification (RSCN) MIB
source: Internet and Management Support for Storage
abstract:
This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB)
for use with network management protocols in the Internet community.
In particular, it describes managed objects for information
related to the management of Fibre Channel's Registered State
Change Notifications (RSCNs).  [STANDARDS-TRACK]
